page.title: 19Things We Like
page.content: I like going on holiday and coming home, being with my Mum, Dad and family, eating chicken, beef and roast potatoes.The fun of being able to roller_skate, lying in the sun and swimming. I like to see other people enjoying themselves and doing the things that I like to do, like eating ice_cream,going to the pier, going to the pictures and drinking coke.I also like to paint and draw, read a long book,look across the countryside on a nice day, fly on an aeroplane,ride on a train, or sail on a boat. I like Friday evening when Cover Up is on, and there's no school the next day.The days George Micheal is on Top of the Pops, and when I have Dr Pepper to drink.Sometimes I enjoy spending some time with my family. I like watching Dallas and listening to my tapes.
